note:
Programmer/director gamedev. 20+ years shipping games in multiple countries in different roles. Ex-Massive, Funcom, Ubisoft Montreal, Milestone Srl, Bohemia Interactive, now in a bit more cosy setting with Unreal. Lots of grey hairs from code, pipelines, bones and bugs.

I only post about gamedev, code, tech and an occasional reminder here and there that the planet is burning.
